name: Yunak
description:
What hides in the depths of the forest and on the tops of the mountains? A hero makes the perilous journey to find out a closely-guarded secret in this puzzle adventure game.

Key features:

  • Story driven
  • Diverse cast of creatures from Bulgarian mythology
  • Tropes and themes representative of folklore
  • Original puzzle mechanic inspired by the classic game "snakes and ladders"
  • The ending depends on choices made in the dialogue

Team members:

  • Xuehua Fu, Art lead (xuehua[at]kth[dot]se)
  • Siyana Ivanova, Narrative lead, music (siyanai[at]kth[dot]se)
  • Roni Kaufman, Design lead, UI/UX (rkaufman[at]kth[dot]se)
  • Tomass Wilson, Tech lead (thmwi[at]kth[dot]se)
  • Ryan Yared, Project management, programming (rcyared[at]kth[dot]se)
